tool_description: An API with Roster and Schedule Results for each NBA Franchise from 1977
name: 1977-2022 NBA Team Rosters and Schedules
title: 1977-2022 NBA Team Rosters and Schedules

api_list.name: Get NBA Franchise W/L Schedule for a Specific Year
api_list.description: Grabs NBA Franchise's W/L Schedule for a specific year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com/v1/nba/BOSTON CELTICS/2008/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com/v1/nba/{franchise}/{year}/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get NBA Franchise Roster For a Specific Year
api_list.description: Grabs NBA Franchise's Roster for a specific year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com/elements/BOSTON CELTICS/2008/roster"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
